cont.entity_a: Good range with MIMO technology. Range is slightly better. Router increased signal strength and coverage significantly.
Serious incompatibility problems with certain devices. Does not maintain connection with specific devices. Intermittent problems with internal wireless mini-PCI cards.

Stopped working after a month. Out of the box, tendency to drop connections after several hours. Router has issues with dropping connections. Router delivers on range and speed but requires regular resets.
cont.entity_b: Crashes frequently, even with the latest firmware. Constant supervision needed to restart the router.

cont.entity_a: Easy to set up and configure. Setup was straightforward. Router is easy to set up with Power over Ethernet (POE). Technical support was helpful during setup issues.
cont.entity_b: Difficult to set up. Setup requires IT knowledge. VPN setup is not intuitive and lacks documentation. Hardware is flawless but requires IT background for setup.

cont.entity_a: Firmware update resolved connectivity issues with DSL provider. Firmware upgrade required to prevent connection drops. Router has problems with firmware and code errors.
cont.entity_b: Firmware upgrade was easy and improved performance.

cont.entity_a: Router provides 108 Mbps speed with proper PCI card. Provides great connection and speed throughout the house. Fast throughput and many configuration options.
Cannot change the subnet address, restricting VPN remote access.
cont.entity_b: Advanced features for VPN and remote access. VPN feature is unreliable. VPN setup is not intuitive and lacks documentation. Router crashes frequently with VPN issues.

cont.entity_a: Router works well initially but had long-term reliability issues. Defective unit required return after technical support diagnosis.
cont.entity_b: Mixed mode wireless performance is poor. Routing functionality is average.
Lacks dual antennas for multipath elimination.

cont.entity_a: Router is sensitive to power surges.
